articles.title: About me
articles.description:
Postdoctoral researcher
Centre for Water Resources Studies
Department of Civil & Resource Engineering
Dalhousie University
Halifax, NS, CAN
articles.contents: My research interests include drinking/source water quality and treatment, water quality data analysis, and corrosion as it relates to drinking water quality. I study the occurrence and mobility of lead and copper in drinking water, the impact of iron corrosion on water quality, and changes in source water bodies that impact drinking water quality (e.g., brownification, cyanobacteria).

articles.title: Benjamin Trueman
articles.description:
Postdoctoral researcher
Centre for Water Resources Studies
Department of Civil & Resource Engineering
Dalhousie University
Halifax, NS, CAN
articles.contents:
About me
I am a water quality specialist with significant experience in statistical programming, data analysis, data management, machine learning, and geochemical modeling.
Website: https://bentrueman.github.io
Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.ca/citations?user=V1hY9TkAAAAJ&hl=en
Academic background
2018 PhD, Civil Engineering
Dalhousie University, Halifax, NSThesis title: “Controlling Lead Release To Drinking Water: Impacts Of Iron Oxides, Complexing Species, Orthophosphate, And Lead Pipe Replacement”
2012 BSc, Environmental Science
Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS
Employment
2022–Present
Postdoctoral employee (Mitacs Accelerate Grant)
Halifax Water/Dalhousie UniversityIn this role, I develop Halifax Water’s capabilities to meet water quality challenges by leveraging the utility’s extensive database and data collection enterprise.
2018–Present
Postdoctoral Employee
Centre for Water Resources Studies, Dalhousie UniversityAt the Centre for Water Resources Studies, I manage research projects related to corrosion control in drinking water systems and advanced chromatographic analysis of colloids and nanoparticles.
2017–Present
ConsultantIn this role, I provide analysis and technical opinions on aspects of drinking water quality and treatment for Health Canada, water utilities, and legal teams.
Skills
R programming (https://github.com/bentrueman) and data analysis (e.g., https://doi.org/10.1021/acsestengg.2c00194)
Geochemical modeling with applications in corrosion control
Developed an R package for predicting lead and copper solubility using PHREEQC, available at https://github.com/bentrueman/pbcusol

Communication
Wrote or co-wrote more than 35 peer-reviewed journal articles
Presented at international academic conferences
